title: Lord of Darkness - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   School Life   Sci-fi   Xuanhuan
tags: Academy   Beasts   Cultivation   Futuristic Setting   Genetic Modifications   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Mutated Creatures   Scientists   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Weak to Strong

description:
Darkness enveloped the sky, who will rule?

This is a story about a young scientist, about his struggle and how he rises. He was once a human, scientific researcher, but now he just wants to be the strongest under the stars!>
